main.name: Shalin Patel
main.description: Enthusiastic Computer Science student with lots of passion and experience in the Software Engineering realm. Excellent programming skills in multiple languages and a strong background in how to work as a team with admirable communication skills.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description1: • Implemented microservice and front-end logic for trial-based onboarding, leading to a $73,000 revenue boost in 2 months, using Golang, Gin, Typescript, React, and PostgreSQL.
work.description2: • Overhauled billing architecture using Airflow and Azure Blob Storage to introduce fault tolerance, data reconciliation, and reduced invoice generation errors by 60%.
work.description3: • Developed endpoints and refined database models with a Test-Driven Development mindset, resulting in the release of public beta endpoints, using Golang, Gin, and PostgreSQL.
work.description4: • Collaborated with Microsoft to integrate Astronomer as an Azure Native ISV service within the Azure Marketplace, contributing to the generation of over $230,000 in sales.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description1: • Led development of flagship Android application with 1M+ downloads and 41,000 monthly active users using Java and following the MVP architecture.
work.description2: • Engineered an asynchronous request architecture for user onboarding, decreasing the onboarding pipeline duration by 38%, using Flask, Celery, Redis, and AWS EC2.
work.description3: • Optimized the backend infrastructure using Flask, PostgreSQL, AWS (S3, EC2), yielding 54% reduction in server-side latency.
work.description4: • Implemented regression testing for Android application using Java, JUnit, Mockito, and Espresso allowing for the discovery of more than 112 bugs and inefficiencies.

work.company: AWS - Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
work.title: Software Development Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Spearheaded the reduction of customer tickets and escalations by approximately 13%, targetting the problem statement towards reducing stuck/failed tasks & DAG issues.
work.description2: • Modelled log parsing and analyzing architectures; implemented in AWS Console using CloudWatch, CDK, React, Node.js allowing for quick debugging for 100K+ MWAA Environments.
work.description3: • Collaborated in the design of a Data Warehouse for key metrics and insights aggregated across MWAA Environments allowing for future Exploratory Data Analysis, incorporating Data Persistence and Streaming.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Developed ETL pipelines to support quant trading strategies across global markets using Python, PostgreSQL, GCP, Nomad and Bamboo.
work.description2: • Built and architected a global search platform for data discovery across on-prem and cloud clusters using React, FastAPI, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Docker, Kubernetes and GKE supporting regex searching of 97,643+ documents.
work.description3: • Designed a system for asynchronous requests to Elasticsearch using FastAPI, Celery, Flower, Redis, PostgreSQL increasing throughput by 68%.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: • Developed significant feature on flagship Mobile application using Java and Kotlin increasing 7-day app retention rate by 34%.
work.description2: • Implemented and designed architecture for endpoint aggregators written in Scala achieving a 72% increase in efficiency and a 46% decrease in code.
work.description3: • Formed dashboards in Sisense and tracked metrics in various features to obtain data directly impacting 6 projects.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description1: • Implemented a route optimization algorithm in C++ similar to the Travelling Salesman Problem, achieving O(nlog(n)) runtime for the average client use case.
work.description2: • Created a full-stack proof-of-concept using React Native, Apollo GraphQL, and Golang that successfully led to full development.
work.description3: • Contributed to client front-end dashboard using React, Mapbox and tested using Jest.
work.description4: • Developed critical in-production admin dashboard using React, Node, Express, and MongoDB.

work.title: Infrastructure Technologies Services Co-op
work.description1: • Worked with IBM's Privileged Identity Manager to handle access management for the secure data servers at the Data Center Operations sector in MGCS.
work.description2: • Optimized SQL queries in SSMS sent through PowerBI reports improving time taken by 54%.

project.title: Python | text2emotion | SpotifyAPI | TwitterAPI
project.description1: • A python bot which tweets a generated spotify playlist based on the emotions captured from a tagged tweet using text2emotion.
project.description2: • Won Best Machine Learning Hack at Hacklytics 2021.

project.title: Python | Pandas | MatPlotLib | Scikit-Learn
project.description1: • Program that successfully predicts power generation and irradiation of solar panels with an 88% accuracy.
project.description2: • Cleaned data using pandas, detecting for missing values and replacing them with their respective means.
project.description3: • Performed EDA using MatPlotLib to graph the data, identify trends and form initial hypotheses.
project.description4: • Implemented DecisionTree and XGBoost Regressor models using Scikit-Learn to validate hypotheses.

project.title: MongoDB | Express.js | React.js | Node.js | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • A full stack MERN web application with a Material UI appearance.
project.description2: • It allows the user to register/login and store their multiple online credentials and safely logout.
project.description3: • Incorporated CRUD functionality, the use of React hooks, context and JWT authentication.

project.title: Django | Python | JavaScript | HTML5 | CSS3
project.description1: • Innovated a Facebook-type application directed towards youth with a space-theme.
project.description2: • Focused on making an elegant, user-friendly interface by using Django for CRUD functionality.
project.description3: • Uploaded on pythonanywhere.com, capturing a web traffic of 674 within the first two months.
